Graphic Designer About

Formosa

Formosa is a warm, sturdy grotesque typeface inspired by vernacular signage in Los Angeles. While much of its geometry reflects models of the past, its construction is informed by warmth, clarity, and performance. Its name comes from the street and iconic LA restaurant. üç¥

Category: Typeface, type specimen
Instructor: Greg Lindy
Year: 2019

Planned for release in 2020.
